summary:
The Security Council,

Noting Judge Shi Jiuyong's resignation effective 28 May 2010, 
Noting a vacancy in the International Court of Justice for the remainder of his term, 
Noting the date of the election to fill the vacancy shall be fixed by the Security Council, 

Decides the election to fill the vacancy shall take place on 29 June 2010 at a meeting of the Security Council and the General Assembly at its sixty-fourth session.
